title: ★ PET FRIENDLY ★ 1 Bdrm in Newton ★ Avail 9/1
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 93462670', 'Rent: $2,800 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'This 1200 sq ft,, 1 bedroom 1 bath apartment is big enough to entertain your guests.', 'Fireplace in the dining room.', 'Charming eat in kitchen with white euro cabinets.', 'Hardwood floor throughout.', 'Heat and hot water are included in the rent.', 'Laundry is in the building.', 'One month brokerage fee.', 'Tram: D Newton Highlands (0.16 mi)', 'Bus: 59 69 Lincoln St (0.08 mi)', 'Bus: 52 Winchester St @ Centre St (0.11 mi)', 'FEATURES', 'Dining Room', 'Dishwasher', 'Eat-in Kitchen', 'Front Porch', 'Gas Heat', 'Gas Range', 'HT&HW', 'Laundry - In building', 'Living Room', 'Microwave', 'Modern Bath', 'Modern Kitchen', 'Non-smoking', 'Porch', 'Walk-In Closet', 'Joyce Fung', '267 218 5231', 'Benjamin Apartments, LLC', '107 Brighton Avenue', 'Boston, MA 02134', 'Click here to search all of our available apartments!', '<URL>/', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
